00039 UndoRedo* UndoRedo::getInstance()
00040 {

00052 void UndoRedo::enqueue(Command* command)
00053 {
00054         emptyRedoStack();
00055         m_undo.push(command);
00056 
00057         // send event to enable undo button
00058         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00059         gnrevent.setGNREventType(SETUNDOENABLED);
00060         gnrevent.SetInt(1);
00061         ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00062 }
00063 
00067 void UndoRedo::undo()
00068 {
00069         if (!m_undo.empty())
00070         {
00071                 // unexecute last command from undo stack and push on redo stack
00072                 Command* command = m_undo.top();
00073                 command->unexecute();
00074                 m_redo.push(command);
00075                 m_undo.pop();
00076         }
00077 
00078         // send event to enable redo button
00079         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00080         gnrevent.setGNREventType(SETREDOENABLED);
00081         gnrevent.SetInt(1);
00082         ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00083 
00084         // send event to diable undo button if undo-stack is empty
00085         if (m_undo.empty())
00086         {
00087                 NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00088                 gnrevent.setGNREventType(SETUNDOENABLED);
00089                 gnrevent.SetInt(0);
00090                 ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00091         }
00092 }
00093 
00097 void UndoRedo::redo()
00098 {
00099         if (!m_redo.empty())
00100         {
00101                 Command* command = m_redo.top();
00102                 command->execute();
00103                 m_undo.push(command);
00104                 m_redo.pop();
00105         }
00106 
00107         // send event to enable undo button
00108         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00109         gnrevent.setGNREventType(SETUNDOENABLED);
00110         gnrevent.SetInt(1);
00111         ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00112 
00113         // send event to disable redo button if redo-stack is empty
00114         if (m_redo.empty())
00115         {
00116                 NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00117                 gnrevent.setGNREventType(SETREDOENABLED);
00118                 gnrevent.SetInt(0);
00119                 ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00120         }
00121 }
00122 
00126 void UndoRedo::emptyRedoStack()
00127 {
00128         Command* command;
00129         while (!m_redo.empty())
00130         {
00131                 command = m_redo.top();
00132                 delete command;
00133                 m_redo.pop();
00134         }
00135 
00136         // send event to disable redo button
00137         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00138         gnrevent.setGNREventType(SETREDOENABLED);
00139         gnrevent.SetInt(0);
00140         ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00141 
00142 }
